original_text: And before him shall be gathered all nations: and he shall separate them one from another, as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats:
korean_text: 모든 민족을 그 앞에 모으고 각각 구분하기를 목자가 양과 염소를 구분하는 것 같이 하여

sentences.original_text: And before him shall be gathered all nations:
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 앞에는 모든 민족이 모일 것입니다:

sentences.original_text: and he shall separate them one from another,
as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats:
